meanings.sent3: The unbuttered popcorn just didn't taste the same.
meanings.sent4: The unbuttered bread felt naked without its usual spread.
meanings.sent5: The unbuttered pancakes lacked the usual richness.

meanings.sent2: He spread the jam unbuttered on the scone.
meanings.sent3: The chef mistakenly served the dish unbuttered.
meanings.sent4: The wheels of the bicycle spun unbuttered down the hill.
meanings.sent5: The door opened unbuttered, revealing a hidden garden.
